name: Free Online QR Decoder - ATools
description: Free online QR Decoder. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online QR Decoder — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" QR Decoder on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.

ui.dropTitle: Click or drop a QR image here
ui.previewHint: Tip: The detected location box is highlighted in green.
ui.resultPlaceholder: Decoded QR content will appear here...
ui.note: Note: Decoding runs locally in your browser. No images are uploaded.
